title: Font on a business card
author: platypus1

comments.content: Taking also into account the numerals, it looks like **[Helvetica Neue (53 Extended)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110623/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=Helvetica%20Neue%20-%2053%20Extended&fid=309631ac7ea2c83577cb2375af7c65ab&fsize=48&text=Michael%20Locke%20323.839.1976%20mlocke%40mlwebco%20CA%2091343&wrap=2)**
